articles.title: Canada bagel in Montreal: symbol of solidarity against tariffs
articles.author: Gareth Madoc-Jones
articles.summary: Fairmont Bagel in Montreal launched the 'Canada bagel,' a braided red and white bagel sprinkled with sesame seeds, to show solidarity amid looming U.S. tariffs. The new product aims to cheer people up and promote buying Canadian products.

articles.title: How Silk & Snow Has Disrupted The Sleep Industry Through Transparency
articles.author: Omaid Homayun
articles.summary: Silk & Snow launched its first product on Kickstarter in 2017. The campaign's success revealed a customer base hungry for transparency and quality, and set the foundation for Silk & Snow's product line, from mattresses to bedding and furniture.

articles.title: Opening soon in Grand Rapids Downtown Market: Rudy's Sub Shop
articles.author: Madalyn Buursma
articles.summary: Rudy's Sub Shop is opening soon in Grand Rapids Downtown Market, offering 10 cold sandwich options with customization. The shop will source bread from Field and Fire and slice lunch meat in front of customers. In addition to standard menu, Rudy's Sub Shop will focus on catering and online ordering.

articles.title: Odd Burger Announces New Retail Listing with Calgary Co-op
articles.author: CNW Group
articles.summary: Odd Burger has expanded its consumer packaged goods (CPG) line by securing a new retail listing with Calgary Co-op. This collaboration will bring Odd Burger's retail line, which includes products like Crispy ChickUn Fillet and Chickpea Burger, to 22 Calgary Co-op locations, nearly doubling Odd Burger's retail distribution points.

articles.title: Byte-Sized AI: AI in Google's Earnings, More Supply Chain Tech Upgrades
articles.author: Meghan Hall
articles.summary: NuVizz launched Vizzard, an AI assistant for logistics professionals, designed to optimize routes and streamline data integration. Google refined its AI-based shopping features, including upgrades to Google Lens and Shopping Graph. DXL expanded its partnership with Bluecore, utilizing their AI-powered technology to personalize customer experiences across channels. Icon launched a platform that helps brands turn existing video content into ads using AI.

articles.title: Google employees are testing new AI Mode search feature
articles.author: Fionna Agomuoh
articles.summary: Google is internally testing 'AI Mode,' a new AI-powered search feature for its search engine. Powered by Gemini 2.0, it enables users to ask open-ended questions and receive AI-generated summaries within search results. The feature blends Google Search with AI capabilities and is accessible on desktop and mobile.

articles.title: The 11 best Valentine's Day flower delivery services to get a fresh bouquet by February 14
articles.author: Amanda Garrity
articles.summary: 1-800-Flowers, FTD, ProFlowers, and Teleflora are Valentine's Day flower delivery services evaluated for wow factor, freshness, packaging, and value. These services utilize local florists which may affect flower variety and quality. Rachel Cho of Rachel Cho Floral Design recommends specific rose types and flower combinations for Valentine's Day bouquets.

articles.title: Anastasia Beverly Hills' new foundation blurs my pores and is worth buying
articles.author: Victoria Giardina
articles.summary: Anastasia Beverly Hills has launched its new Impeccable Blurring Second-Skin Matte Foundation, featuring a range of 25 shades with a matte finish. The foundation aims to balance complexion, minimize texture, redness, pores, and acne scarring, providing a lightweight, natural finish.  The brand recommends pairing the foundation with Anastasia Beverly Hill's matching Impeccable 24HR Blurring Matte Setting Spray.

articles.title: This upcoming phone could be the best foldable this year
articles.author: Nirave Gondhia
articles.summary: Oppo is preparing to launch the Find N5, anticipated to be rebranded as the OnePlus Open 2 in the US and global markets. The phone is teased to be the thinnest and most durable folding phone, featuring a possible IPX9 rating, a 6.85-inch LTPO display, Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and potentially a triple Hasselblad camera. Compared to current folding phones, it will likely have better battery life, a better camera, faster charging, and better durability.

articles.title: Amazon just made it easier to shop Canadian brands and products
articles.author: Kate Mendonca
articles.summary: A duck down pillow offering plush comfort is available in multiple sizes. Puppy training can be aided with mini freeze-dried beef liver treats. Live Clean Baby offers a baby care set containing shampoo, body wash, cream, ointment and jelly.

articles.title: Coca-Cola Orange Cream Review: Close, But Not Exactly The Cream Of The Crop
articles.author: Michael Palan
articles.summary: Coca-Cola is introducing a new Orange Cream flavor, available in both full sugar and zero sugar options, starting February 10 in the U.S. and Canada. The product comes in various packaging options, including 12-ounce cans, 20-ounce bottles, and 7.5-ounce mini cans, and can be purchased at retail stores, grocery stores, convenience stores, and online through sites like DoorDash, Instacart, and coca-cola.com.

articles.title: Premium quality, mid-range price: Is the OnePlus 13 the most affordable Android flagship?
articles.author: YINON BEN SHUSHAN
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the OnePlus 13 in Israel, available through Sel-Now. The OnePlus 13 features a flat design, Crystal Shield display protection, enhanced water resistance (IP68 and IP69 certifications), OxygenOS 15, a 6,000mAh battery, and a 50MP Hasselblad camera system. It is priced starting at NIS 3,499.

articles.title: Amazon's hidden coupon section has huge deals on big-ticket items
articles.author: Christina Marfice
articles.summary: Amazon is offering coupons for various new products. These include the HP Premium 17.3" Touchscreen Laptop, Boytond Ultra Open-Ear-Earbuds Wireless Bluetooth, EF ECOFLOW Portable Power Station DELTA 2, AVAPOW 6000A Car Battery Jump Starter, dreame L10s Ultra Robot Vacuum and Mop Combo, RENPHO Eye Massager, SMOTURE Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, CCEOO TOY Self-Cleaning Litter Box, BLUETTI AC180 Portable Power Station, Hiboy S2/S2R Plus Electric Scooter and FP FLEXPEDIC Queen Mattress, each offering unique features and benefits.

articles.title: ALL3D: Transforming Retail with Virtualization and 3D Innovation
articles.summary: ALL3D has launched a 3D virtualization platform that enables retailers and manufacturers to design, market, and sell products virtually. The platform allows the creation of photorealistic 3D models, virtual product showcases, and metaverse-ready digital assets. Retailers like Wayfair and Bassett Mirror are already using ALL3D to streamline product development and enhance shopping experiences.

articles.title: Kirill Yurovskiy: How AI and Robotics Are Changing Laundry Services
articles.summary: The laundry industry is being transformed through the introduction of AI and robotics. This shift involves automated systems for washing, sorting, and folding garments, making the process faster and more efficient. The use of technology aims to streamline processes, reduce labor costs, and enhance customer satisfaction.

articles.title: 'Secret Lives of Mormon Wives' favorite 'dirty soda' shop Swig to open Nashville locations
articles.author: Hadley Hitson
org: Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
articles.summary: Swig, a soda-shop chain, is opening new locations in Brentwood (February 27th) and Spring Hill, Tennessee, offering 'dirty sodas' which are soft drinks mixed with flavored syrups, creamers, or fruit. The Brentwood location will offer free 24-ounce drinks through March 1st. The company aims to become one of the fastest-growing beverage companies.

articles.title: Save $320 on Samsung's Snapdragon laptop with 21 hours of battery
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Book4 Edge laptop, praised for its thin and light design, long battery life, and OLED display, initially faced criticism for its high price. However, a sale has addressed the pricing concern.

articles.title: Google Search is getting an AI Mode soon – here's what it does
articles.summary: Google is preparing to launch AI Mode in Google Search, powered by a custom version of Gemini 2.0, designed to improve search capabilities by providing detailed answers and organizing information with links.  This AI Mode, currently in internal testing, will allow users to ask open-ended questions and receive AI-generated responses similar to those from ChatGPT, accompanied by links to sources.

articles.title: This AI Generator Can Develop Content That's Fact-Checked
articles.author: Techrepublic Academy
articles.summary: Katteb has launched an AI content generator that helps create fact-checked articles and product reviews. It can generate SEO-optimized articles with in-text citations and relevant images. The lifetime subscription is available for $79.99.

articles.title: M&S shoppers praise 'luxurious' bedding set that's 'silky soft' and looks 'expensive'
articles.author: Catherine Addison-Swan
articles.summary: Marks & Spencer (M&S) has launched a new bedding set with a reversible damask-inspired design, zip fastening, and priced from £39.50 to £69. The bedding is available in blue, grey, pink, or green, and customers have praised its quality and ease of use.

articles.title: The Chevy Blazer EV SS Makes 615 HP, 10% More Than Originally Promised
articles.author: Emmet White
articles.summary: General Motors' Chevrolet has launched the 2025 Chevrolet Blazer EV SS with upgraded power ratings of 615 hp and 650 lb-ft of torque. The electric performance crossover can accelerate from 0-60 mph in a claimed 3.4 seconds, with a base model price starting at $61,995.

articles.title: 'Car Wash Wars' is a car-centric comedy series based on a Saint John car wash
articles.author: Matthew Guy
articles.summary: Bell Fibe TV is launching "Car Wash Wars," a new Canadian-based comedy show consisting of five episodes. The show centers around Kayla Polley, who takes over her dad's manual car wash, and her competition with Mr. Dulse, who opens an automated car wash.

articles.title: Ninja Luxe Café Review – the best thing to happen to my morning coffee
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Ninja Luxe Café machine, which is a three-in-one appliance that can make espresso, coffee, and cold brew. The machine features a built-in scale for grinding beans, multiple drink size options, and a frothing system with various milk settings. It is priced at $500.

articles.title: Simba Hybrid Pillow review: I tried the £109 memory foam pillow — does it live up to its 20,000 five star reviews?
articles.author: Kiya-Ellen Syrett
articles.summary: Simba has launched the Simba Hybrid Pillow featuring Stratos cool-touch sleep tech and customisable Nanocubes. The pillow retails for £109, but is currently on sale for £92.65, and is designed to offer a luxurious and adjustable sleep experience, though some users may prefer the firmer Simba Hybrid Firm.

articles.title: Dyson hair styling tools never go on sale. Save $100 on special edition Airwraps and Nural hair dryers
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Dyson is offering $100 off on special edition Strawberry Bronze versions of the Dyson Airwrap for different hair types and the Dyson Supersonic Nural Hair Dryer. A new Dyson Airwrap i.d. Multi-Styler and Dyer for Straight + Wavy Hair in Red Velvet/Gold is also available. Orders from Dyson's website include free shipping, a two-year warranty, a 30-day money-back guarantee, and flexible payment options.

articles.title: NewJeans Give FIRST Interview After Rebranding As NJZ, ADOR Finds Decision 'Unfortunate'
articles.summary: K-pop group NewJeans has rebranded as NJZ following their separation from ADOR. The group is planning new projects for 2025, with a first performance post rebranding in Hong Kong, including a new song.

articles.title: Samsung launches Galaxy S25 worldwide
articles.author: Ahn Sung-mi
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics launched its Galaxy S25 series in major markets, featuring Google's Gemini AI, One UI 7, and new AI-powered tools.  A new subscription service, New Galaxy AI Subscription Club, offers benefits such as refunds, insurance and discounts. The lineup includes standard, Plus, and Ultra editions, with prices starting at 1.15 million won.

articles.title: 'Versatile' electric shaver branded 'best ever' gets huge £185 price slash on Amazon
articles.author: Kerri-ann Roper
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of the Braun Series 7 Electric Shaver to £164.99, a 53% discount from £349.99. The shaver features three flex blades, 360-degree adaptation, AutoSense technology, and beard trimmer attachments. Other price drops include the Philips Shaver Series 7000 on Amazon and the REMINGTON Limitless X9 on Currys.

articles.title: 'I gave Galaxy's new pink drink a go - now I simply can't get enough'
articles.author: Amber O'Connor Money
articles.summary: Galaxy has introduced a new Pink Hot Chocolate, available at Home Bargains, B&M, and Heron Foods. The drink is described as a sweet, white hot chocolate flavor. Social media users and taste testers have generally reacted positively to the new product.

articles.title: 'I tried Galaxy's new pink hot chocolate - it's a must if you have a sweet tooth'
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: Galaxy has launched a new pink hot chocolate, which is receiving positive feedback on social media for its taste, described as a classic white hot chocolate flavor. Other flavors, such as Fudge Brownie and Gingerbread, are also available. The pink hot chocolate can be found at Home Bargains, B&M, and Heron Foods.

articles.title: Add two cheap ingredients to make your pancakes ‘bubbly and fluffy'
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: The company introduces Zesty Lemon Pancakes, a product described as perfectly suited for Sunday brunch and dusted with powdered sugar.

articles.title: A foldable tiny home you can install in just 60 minutes without tools
articles.author: Joe Salas
articles.summary: Boxabl has launched the Baby Box, an ultra-compact, foldable tiny home priced at US$19,999. The 120-sq-ft unit includes essential amenities and is designed for easy setup, with the option for customer delivery or pickup.

articles.title: What are Differences Between BB, CC, and DD Creams?
articles.summary: The article presents various BB, CC, and DD creams from different brands, highlighting their specific features and benefits. Maybelline Dream Pure BB Cream is introduced as a light, oil-free option for acne-prone skin, Garnier Skin Active BB Cream Original SPF 15 is described as hydrating with a dewy finish, and Missha M Perfect Cover BB Cream SPF 42 offers impressive coverage. Nivea Luminous 630 Anti-Dark Spots 3-in-1 CC Fluid SPF 30 is presented as a CC fluid to tackle hyperpigmentation and Paese DD Cream Daily Defense SPF 30 (7W Caramel) defends against environmental stressors. The products are designed to provide different functions like hydrating, color correcting, and providing anti-aging benefits.

articles.title: Persil® Laundry Detergent Announces Persil® Activewear Clean as a 2025 Product of the Year USA Winner
articles.author: Persil
articles.summary: Persil's Activewear Clean, a laundry detergent designed for athletic wear, received the 2025 Product of the Year USA Award. Launched in 2024, the detergent fights body oil and sweat, eliminates odors, and helps maintain fabric shape and stretch. It is available in liquid and Ultra Pacs forms at Walmart, Target, Amazon, and other retailers.

articles.title: Girl Scouts of Northern New Jersey Announces Location of Future Girl Scout DreamLab
org: Girl Scouts of Northern New Jersey
articles.summary: Girl Scouts of Northern New Jersey (GSNNJ) announced the transformation of its Service Center in Paramus, New Jersey, into a 'Girl Scout DreamLab,' with an estimated grand opening in spring 2026. The DreamLab will offer flexible experience space, a retail shop, and offices, shaping the future of Girl Scouting in northern New Jersey. The DreamLab is designed to foster leadership, encourage curiosity, and embrace innovation, offering immersive experiences tailored to members and the community, including activities like scientific experimentation, engineering, podcasting, and video production.

articles.title: The best Shark vacuums for 2025, tested and reviewed
articles.author: Kristin Granero
articles.summary: SharkNinja is known for its practical appliances, introducing the best Shark vacuums for 2025 with automatic shifting and dirt/edge detection. The lineup includes powerful upright and versatile cordless stick vacuums that stand out for their performance, ease of use, and design. Several models are detailed including Shark Navigator, Rotator Pet, Detect Pro, Stratos and Wandvac, highlighting features like HEPA filters, auto-empty systems, and specialized brushes for different needs.

articles.title: Bosch's powerful pressure washer that 'obliterates dirt' is on sale
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of the Bosch EasyAquatak 110 High-Pressure Washer to £66.06. Argos is offering the Black + Decker Vertical Pressure Washer for £57, its lowest price ever. These deals provide opportunities to purchase these products at reduced costs.

articles.title: Dacia Petrie, the Jamaican whose app is connecting people to over 3,000 Black-owned businesses
articles.author: Abu Mubarik
articles.summary: Black Nile, an app designed by Dacia Petrie, has launched to connect users with over 3,000 Black-owned businesses across 40+ categories. The app integrates Google Maps for locating nearby businesses and allows user reviews. Black Nile aims to create a platform that represents and supports Black-owned businesses, offering a user-friendly directory optimized for mobile devices.

articles.title: Target restocked the Ninja SLUSHi and it's $50 cheaper than Ninja has it for — get it now before it's gone
articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Target experienced a quick sell-out of the Ninja SLUSHi Professional Drink Maker, which is priced at $300. The Ninja SLUSHi utilizes RapidChill technology to create temperature and texture-controlled drinks without ice and can keep beverages flowing for up to 12 hours.

articles.title: New Vodafone deal can save you £768 on a brand new Samsung Galaxy S25
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Samsung recently released the Galaxy S25 line, featuring upgraded AI capabilities and a faster processor. Vodafone offers contracts for the Galaxy S25 models, including deals with potential savings on trade-ins and a lifetime warranty with free battery replacement.

articles.title: Seven kitchen gadgets I can't live without: ‘How does anyone make a salad without one?'
articles.author: Elizabeth Quinn
articles.summary: The article highlights several kitchen gadgets. The Zyliss salad spinner, with its various iterations, is praised for efficient lettuce drying. The Microplane dual blade zester and Dreamfarm Ozest are recommended for citrus zesting. The Avanti lemon squeezer and Dreamfarm lemon fluicer aid in juice extraction.  The travel AeroPress coffee maker offers a compact brewing solution.

articles.title: R.Lux names Kim Go-eun as first brand ambassador
articles.author: 주부엉의 주식레시피
articles.summary: R.Lux, a luxury beauty service by Coupang, launched the 'New Rule. New Luxury' campaign. This campaign highlights the brand's commitment to speed, exclusivity, and accessibility in luxury beauty shopping. Additionally, R.Lux has expanded its digital presence by releasing an Android app to reach a broader audience.

articles.title: 2025 Toyota Yaris Cross GXL Hybrid review
articles.author: Matt Campbell
articles.summary: The MG ZS Hybrid+ features twin 12.3-inch screens across its range. This makes it a more modern alternative compared to its predecessor.

articles.title: AI Can Help You Choose a Hairstyle Before Going to the Salon. Here's How
articles.author: Amanda Smith
articles.summary: Lightricks' Facetune app introduces a new service that allows users to virtually try on different hairstyles, colors, makeup, and outfits using AI.  The app offers both free and paid versions and aims to provide users with a tool to experiment with their look before committing to a real-life change.  Users can select different options to smooth skin, whiten teeth and clear blemishes.

articles.title: Next shoppers love 'excellent' £14 perfume gift set
articles.author: Sarah Lumley
articles.summary: Next has introduced the 'Set of 6 Mini Perfumes Discovery Set' for under £15, which includes miniature bottles of their most iconic perfumes such as Just Pink Eau de Parfum, Eau Nude, White Amber, and Divinity. This gift set is available for purchase and has received positive reviews from customers.

articles.title: Kanye West Launches Cheapest Yeezy Shoes Ever—The Price Will Stun You!
articles.author: Aanchal Chaudhary
articles.summary: Kanye West's YZY brand launched the YZY SLPR, a minimalist slipper-style sneaker priced at $20. The YZY SLPR features a low-cut silhouette with a full-length rippled traction sole and is available in sizes 2 to 16. This launch makes high-end streetwear more accessible.

articles.title: Looking for a natural fabric softener? Try this simple hack!
articles.summary: Cornflower oil is introduced as a natural and eco-friendly ingredient for homemade fabric softener. Using cornflower oil offers benefits like biodegradability, non-toxicity, gentle fiber treatment, and hypoallergenic properties for sensitive skin. Mixing it with white vinegar provides a cost-effective solution for softer, fresher, and static-free laundry.

articles.title: 10 Best New Aldi Arrivals for Your Money in February
articles.author: Heather Taylor
articles.summary: Aldi is introducing new products, including a pizza cookie by Mama Cozzi's and a boule. Some of these items will be available starting February 5th, with all selections priced under $20.

articles.title: I let ChatGPT's new ‘agent' manage my life. It spent $31 on a dozen eggs.
articles.author: Geoffrey A. Fowler
articles.summary: OpenAI has introduced 'Operator,' an AI agent currently available as a preview with ChatGPT Pro, designed to perform real-world tasks. One user experienced the AI autonomously purchasing eggs for $31.43 due to a misinterpretation of the task and a failure of safety guardrails, highlighting both the potential and challenges of this new product.

articles.title: New fast-food restaurant to open with exclusive deals for first customers
articles.author: Amy Myles
articles.summary: Slamburger, a new fast-food restaurant, launched in Glasgow on February 7th. To celebrate their grand opening, they offered 50% off selected menu items from 5pm to 11pm. The menu includes burgers, wraps, sides, and salads.

articles.title: Online sales of Azerbaijani products launch in Turkmenistan
articles.author: Aydan Alasgarli
articles.summary: Online sales of "Made in Azerbaijan" products have launched in Turkmenistan. Azerbaijani products, including teas, jams, juices, and canned foods, are now available on "GiperTM", "Ynamdar", and "AshgabatMarket" online platforms.

articles.title: I spent three months abroad and used a £14 SPF face cream every day – it made my skin glow
articles.author: Holly Gonsalves
articles.summary: Hada Labo Tokyo's SPF cream is reviewed, noting its hydrating and glow-enhancing effects, although it may not be completely matte. CeraVe and Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hydrating Fluid sun creams are highlighted as alternative sun protection options with high customer ratings.

articles.title: Zomato, Uber And Other Companies That Changed Their Logos In 2025
articles.summary: Zomato is rebranding its food delivery service and changing its name to Eternal. This change represents a new chapter for the company.

articles.title: These Affordable Earbuds Might Be The Highest-Rated Tech We've Ever Seen
articles.author: Erica Kam
articles.summary: Tozo has launched the T10 wireless earbuds, which retail starting at $19. These earbuds feature ORIGX professional tuning and acoustic technology, adjustable audio settings via the Tozo app, and up to 45 hours of battery life with the charging case. The T10s are sweat-, water-, and rain-resistant, with smart touch controls and Bluetooth connectivity.

articles.title: Lux Industries Unveils Lux Nitro: A Bold New Chapter in Men's Innerwear After 22 Years
articles.author: ANI
articles.summary: Lux Industries Limited has launched Lux Nitro, a new premium men's innerwear brand, after 22 years in the men's innerwear segment. Kartik Aaryan is the brand ambassador, and the brand emphasizes inner strength and confidence. Lux Nitro products will be available nationwide in retail outlets and online marketplaces.

articles.title: Lux Nitro: Redefining Men's Innerwear with Style and Confidence
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Lux Industries Limited launched Lux Nitro, a new premium men's innerwear brand, after two decades. Kartik Aaryan is the brand ambassador, targeting young consumers. The product will be available nationwide with a comprehensive media campaign.

articles.title: NewJeans rebrands as NJZ, set to perform in Hong Kong next month
articles.author: 심선아
articles.summary: K-pop group NewJeans has rebranded as NJZ and announced its first independent activities, including a performance at "Complex Live" in Hong Kong from March 21 to 23. NJZ plans to showcase new music during this performance, marking their debut under the new name.

articles.title: HONOR X9c: When unbreakable meets unstoppable – real users share their experience
articles.author: HONOR
articles.summary: HONOR launched the HONOR X9c smartphone, emphasizing its durability, 108MP Ultra-sensing Camera with OIS, 6600mAh Silicon-carbon Battery, and AI features. The phone features a 6.78-inch OLED display and MagicOS 8.0 to enhance productivity, providing flagship-level performance in a mid-range package.

articles.title: Wabag Water Services acquired by Romanian company
articles.author: Romania Journal
articles.summary: WABAG Water Services rebranded to NAIAD, aims to expand its services beyond project implementation, with a focus on after-sales support and direct equipment delivery. NAIAD also partners with a Swiss company to offer innovative water reuse and recycling solutions. Furthermore, NAIAD plans to invest in its own research and development center.

articles.title: 'Olive oil is definitely in our DNA': Tunisian immigrant and his son open Downtown Lakeland shop
articles.author: Sara-Megan Walsh
articles.summary: Alzaytoon, a new family-owned olive oil and balsamic vinegar shop, has opened in Downtown Lakeland, Florida. The store offers a variety of olive oils imported from Tunisia, flavored oils, and balsamic vinegars. A grand opening celebration will be held, marking the launch of Alzaytoon's first brick-and-mortar shop after initially vending online.

articles.title: OnlyFans Developers, Take Note! Tech Giant Begrudgingly Accepts Its First Native iPhone Porn App
articles.author: Hazel Hawke
articles.summary: Hot Tub, a new adults-only content app, has launched in the European market and is accessible through alternative app stores. Apple is reluctantly allowing the app due to EU regulations. For the month of February, all Patreon earnings from the alt-store hosting Hot Tub will be donated to The Trevor Project, Red Umbrella Fund, and other LGBTQIA+ and sex worker support groups.

articles.title: If You Haven't Already Seen These 32 Ridiculously Useful Products, I'm So Glad To Be The One Who Tells You About Them
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: The article highlights the launch and availability of several new products, including the new 2024 mini Kindle which is faster and more portable, Neutrogena's Collagen Bank Daily Facial Moisturizer with SPF 30 which provides both skin protection and skincare in one product, and Olay Cleansing Melts + Retinol Face Cleanser which provide a deep clean without irritation. Several small businesses are also featured such as Touchland with their Power Mist hydrating hand sanitizer and Laundry Club with their eco-friendly laundry detergent sheets.

articles.title: Tucker Carlson Says His New Nicotine Pouches Could Launch a Revolution. So We Tried Them.
articles.author: Ian Ward
articles.summary: Tucker Carlson launched ALP, a new line of tobacco-free nicotine pouches, as a competitor to Zyn in December. The product comes in five flavors and three nicotine strengths. Carlson has been promoting ALP as a demonstration of dissent against the mainstream public health and medical communities.

articles.title: Dyson knocks £100 off 'powerful' best-selling cordless vacuum with 'great battery life'
articles.author: Nisha Mal
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a discount on its V8 Advanced vacuum, featuring increased suction, de-tangling technology, and a 40-minute run time. The updated vacuum is designed for households with children or pets and includes two power modes and a no-touch bin emptying mechanism. Shark also has a selection of offers on its vacuums.

articles.title: 2025 – The year of personalised 5G network experiences
articles.author: Globaldata Technology
articles.summary: AIS launched AIS Living Network, a service allowing customers to customize their 5G network experience with upgrade boosters for prioritized access. The service features Boost Mode, Game Mode, and Live Mode, each offering optimized 5G performance for specific use cases at a fixed price. To broaden appeal, AIS introduced QR codes and USSD provisioning channels, standardized pricing, and conducted both online and offline marketing campaigns.

articles.title: Chia Seeds for hair growth: How Chia Seed Oil promotes hair growth and how to use it
articles.author: TOI Lifestyle Desk
articles.summary: Chia seed oil is introduced as a potent ingredient for promoting hair growth and improving hair health.  It can be used in various hair care routines like direct scalp massages, nourishing hair masks mixed with ingredients such as honey and yogurt, and as a leave-in conditioner when mixed with water in a spray bottle. The oil can also be combined with other essential oils like peppermint or rosemary.

articles.title: How smart watch is revolutionizing the lifestyle of Pakistani teenagers
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: Smartwatches offer features like health monitoring, GPS, and time management, enhancing productivity. They are user-friendly, water-resistant, and versatile in design. Pakistani online stores like Xcessorieshub now offer easy access to renowned smartwatch brands nationwide.

articles.title: Wet and dry shaver better than half price as 'very happy' buyers say 'it works well'
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: The 360° adaptation shaver features three flex blades and AutoSense technology, which adapts power based on beard density. It offers up to three weeks of battery life and is 100% waterproof for wet or dry shaving. The shaver includes additional beard and stubble trimmer attachments, with users reporting positive experiences regarding its performance.

articles.title: Best washing machines under  ₹15000: Top 10 affordable picks for powerful and efficient cleaning at home
articles.author: Bharat Sharma
articles.summary: Whirlpool, Samsung, LG, Godrej, Haier, and Voltas Beko introduce various washing machine models under ₹ 15,000. Whirlpool's models include the 7 kg 5-star Royal fully-automatic top-loading washing machine with hard water wash technology and the 7 kg 5-star Ace Supreme semi-automatic washing machine with a 1400 RPM motor, while LG features the 7 kg 5-star semi-automatic washing machine with Wind Jet Dry technology. Godrej offers fully-automatic washing machines with Zero Pressure Technology and I-Wash technology; Samsung features a semi-automatic washing machine with Air Turbo Drying, and Haier introduces Oceanus Wave technology in its fully-automatic models, and Voltas Beko has pulsator wash with double waterfall technology.

articles.title: Nestl launches dairy demonstration farm
articles.author: Daily Trust
articles.summary: Nestl Nigeria launched a dairy demonstration farm in Paikon Kore. The farm is part of the Nestl Nigeria Livestock Development Project (NLDP), initiated in 2021 to enhance local dairy farmer productivity.

articles.title: The no-code/low-code revolution: Why it can't be ignored
articles.author: silicon
articles.summary: Businesses are increasingly adopting no-code/low-code tools like Stripe Checkout, Webflow, Retool, Intercom's Fin and Stripe's Sigma to speed up development cycles and reduce platform costs. These tools allow both technical and non-technical users to build applications and automate workflows. The integration of AI with NCLC platforms is anticipated to further transform their functionality, offering features like AI assistants for workflow generation and process optimization.

articles.title: The Samsung Galaxy S25 and S25 Plus are great phones but nothing new
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 and S25 Plus smartphones. The S25 features a 6.1-inch screen, while the S25 Plus has a larger 6.7-inch screen and bigger battery. Both phones include updated One UI 7 software and Galaxy AI features, however, these AI features will only be free until the end of 2025 and may turn into subscription based in the future.

articles.title: List of 100+ Groundbreaking Innovations That Changed The World Forever
articles.summary: Motorola launched the first handheld mobile phone in 1973. Apple launched the iPhone, the first widely available smartphone with multi-touch capabilities, on January 9th, 2007. These innovations have significantly changed communication and technology.

articles.title: Xiaomi Highlights Innovative features ahead of Redmi Note 14 Launch
articles.author: Pauline Torongo
articles.summary: Xiaomi is launching the Redmi Note 14 Series, including the Redmi Note 14 Pro+ 5G, on February 11, 2025. The Redmi Note 14 Pro+ 5G features a 200MP camera, up to 512GB storage, 120W fast charging, a 5110mAh battery, IP68 dust and water resistance, and Corning Gorilla Glass Victus display. The launch event will feature exclusive sneak peeks, interactive demonstrations, and immersive experiences.

articles.title: RELX introduces customizable vape with RELX WeCreate
articles.summary: RELX introduced the RELX WeCreate, a customizable closed-pod system vaping device designed for adult smokers. It features an 800mAh battery, USB Type-C charging, a smart display, adjustable airflow, and comes with 14 distinctive pod flavors. The device is certified with the Philippine Product Standard Mark and includes a child lock for safety.

articles.title: Room for one more? Chinese car brand Lynk & Co eyes Australian launch
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Lynk & Co is considering the best method to introduce its competitive products, Lynk & Co 08 and Lynk & Co 09, to the market. The company recognizes the products' potential but seeks the optimal launch strategy.

articles.title: 43 Mundane Household Essentials That'll Actually Make Your Life Easier
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: The article presents a curated list of popular products available on Amazon, ranging from household cleaning solutions to kitchen appliances and organizational tools. It features items like The Pink Stuff all-purpose paste, Slobproof touch-up paint pens, Swiffer PowerMop, Levoit air purifier, and various other innovative products from small businesses like Therapy Clean, Angry Orange, StoveShelf, Pardo Naturals, and Wad-Free, showcasing their unique functionalities and benefits to enhance everyday living.

articles.title: Trowbridge Hand Car Wash opens in town
articles.author: Jamie Singleton
articles.summary: Trowbridge Hand Car Wash launched its new car wash service on February 4th, located in the NCP Trowbridge Innox Mills Car Park. The service offers a range of options from standard washes to full valets, with prices ranging from £10 to £120. The car wash is open seven days a week with varying hours.

articles.title: New car wash businesses opens its doors in town
articles.author: Jamie Singleton
articles.summary: Trowbridge Hand Car Wash opened in Trowbridge town centre on February 6, offering services ranging from a basic wash and dry for £10 to a full valet for £120. The car wash also provides cleaning services for larger vehicles like lorries and operates seven days a week.

articles.title: Google Tests AI-Powered Search Mode With Employees
articles.author: Slashdot
articles.summary: Google is internally testing a new "AI Mode" for its search engine, powered by Gemini 2.0 AI. This chatbot-like feature handles complex queries and follow-up questions, generating detailed responses with web links. It targets exploratory searches like product comparisons.

articles.title: Google Is About to Make Its AI Search Results Even Better
articles.author: Simon Batt
articles.summary: Google is internally testing a new AI search tool powered by Gemini 2.0, designed to answer complex questions that traditional search struggles with. This tool will allow users to ask follow-up questions, similar to an AI chatbot, but there is no planned release date.

articles.title: Alex based entrepreneur is bringing fresh smell to the township
articles.author: Print Content
articles.summary: In 2024, Alexandra businesswoman Mashudu Mutheiwana launched her home fragrance brand, specializing in diffusers and scented candles. The brand has received positive responses from the local community, and Mutheiwana is leveraging social media to expand her reach beyond Alexandra.

articles.title: Swig brings its signature ‘dirty sodas' to Bartonville
articles.author: Staff Reports
articles.summary: Swig, a drive-thru beverage chain, has expanded its presence by launching a new location in Bartonville, North Texas. This new store offers Swig's diverse menu of beverages and treats. Swig operates over 100 locations nationwide as of early 2025.

articles.title: S'pore brand included in New York Times' list of best instant noodles
articles.author: Kim Tan
articles.summary: Prima Taste Singapore's Laksa La Mian instant noodles were featured on The New York Times' list of best instant noodles in the United States. The product, known for its resemblance to authentic laksa, chewy noodles, and flavorful mix of ingredients, was selected by a panel of experts and tested by the NYT kitchen team.

articles.title: Ace Bed announced on the 7th that it will hold the "The Dream Fair" promotion for coma and moving at..
articles.author: Lee Yu-jin
articles.summary: Ace Bed has announced "The Dream Fair" promotion, offering high-end bedding sets as free gifts to customers who purchase products at their offline stores until the 16th of next month. Ace Wedding Members also receive benefits, including discounts and gifts, and expanded partnerships in various fields to aid in marriage preparations.

articles.title: The technology that will change your life in 2025
articles.author: Alice Clarke
articles.summary: Samsung introduced the Pyrolytic Flex Door Oven with AI Camera, which uses AI to automatically detect food and suggest cooking programs. Samsung also features a smart washing machine with AI that suggests wash cycles based on user patterns. Eufy is mentioned for its smart breast pump.

articles.title: The smart home technology that will change your life in 2025
articles.author: Alice Clarke
articles.summary: Samsung introduces the Pyrolytic Flex Door Oven with AI Camera that automatically detects food and cooks it accordingly, while the Smart Things app recommends recipes based on ingredients detected by the Family Hub refrigerator. LeGrand Excel Life Smart light switches and power sockets offer remote control and automation for lighting, offering convenience and security. The article mentions other products such as Philips Hue bulbs, Withings Sleep Analyser, Roborock robot vacuum cleaner, and Eufy breast pump, highlighting the increasing integration of AI and connectivity in everyday appliances.

articles.title: Just 31 Magical Products You Can Get For Under $20
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: The article features a collection of newly highlighted products across various categories, offering solutions for cleaning, skincare, and haircare. Noteworthy mentions include O'Keeffe's cream for hand moisturization, The Pink Stuff cleaning paste for revitalizing surfaces, Gold Bond's firming neck and chest cream for skincare, and Maple Holistics biotin shampoo for hair fullness, as well as many cleaning and skincare products from various companies.

articles.title: Kanye West just introduced the cheapest Yeezy shoes ever - Prepare to be shocked by the price!
articles.author: TOI Lifestyle Desk
articles.summary: YZY brand unveiled the Yeezy SLPR, a new footwear model priced at $20. The Yeezy SLPR features a low-cut design with a full-length rippled traction sole. Available in sizes ranging from 2 to 16 (in increments of 2), the YZY SLPR aims to cater to a wide array of customers.

articles.title: PlayStation Plus members shouldn't miss the chance to score the PlayStation Portal at a bargain ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: PlayStation offers PlayStation Plus members a 20% discount on accessories such as the DualSense Edge and PS Portal at PS Direct.

articles.title: NewJeans Change Name To NJZ Amid Legal Battle With Ador
articles.author: Stereogum
articles.summary: The K-pop group NewJeans is changing its name to NJZ. NJZ announced that they will headline ComplexCon Hong Kong.

articles.title: Tezza Barton Talks Fashion Week, Photo Filters And App's New TezzaCam
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Tezza app promotes its 'Butter filter' during New York Fashion Week. The filter has vintage tones and aligns with brands like Tory Burch, Coach, and Sandy Liang.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 review: The top Android phone for most people, with a stark performance ...
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy S25 and Galaxy S25 Plus are presented as first-rate Android phones. They are specifically highlighted as worthwhile upgrades, particularly for users with older devices, hinting at new features and capabilities.

articles.title: В Орёл доставили первые троллейбусы из новой партии
articles.summary: MyDesigns has launched Vision AI that generates SEO-friendly titles, descriptions, and tags for product listings. HeyGen offers an AI avatar to recreate videos in other languages. Google's AI assistant Gemini summarizes emails and brainstorms new ideas.
